title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 4
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

After a flat sprint stage, the General Classification stayed the same today in the Vuelta España. Red jersey holder Rein Taaramäe was caught up in a crash towards the finish, but as it happened inside 3km to go, he was given the same time as the main peloton which included all the GC favourites.

1. Rein Taaramäe
2. Kenny Elissonde +0:25
3. Primož Roglič +0:30
4. Lilian Calmejane +0:35
5. Enric Mas+0:45
6. Miguel Ángel López +0:51
7. Alejandro Valverde +0:57
8. Giulio Ciccone +0:57
9. Egan Bernal +0:57
10. Mikel Landa +1:09

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Fabio Jakobsen - 100 points
2. Jasper Philipsen - 68 points
3. Alex Aranburu - 50 points
4. Michael Matthews - 43 points
5. Rein Taaramäe - 30 points

La Vuelta stage 4 preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Rein Taaramäe - 10 points
2. Kenny Elissonde - 7 points
3. Joe Dombrowski - 6 points
4. Tobias Bayer - 5 points
5. Sepp Kuss - 3 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Egan Bernal
2. Gino Mäder + 0:13
3. Aleksandr Vlasov +0:16
4. Rémy Rochas +0:54
5. Mauri Vansevenant +0:55

Team Classification

1. UAE Team Emirates
2. Movistar +0:22
3. Bahrain Victorious +0:50
4. Trek-Segafredo +1:14
5. Ineos Grenadiers +1:15

author: Peter Stuart
